nodes.title: fix(networking-timeout): graceful shutdown after failed connection
fix(network): fix server info request and ping error handling
Fix some misspells / typing errors in czech translation
Drop creation of unnecessary array on new chunk event
feat(subsystems): add creating and loading `reflections.cache` for subsystems
fix: prevent NPE during movement interpolation
feat(JOML): migrate `character` package events and systems
perf(chunkprovider): add sorting for incoming request on chunk loading/generation.
feat(JOML): migrate player spawn component and logic
fix: tweak lighting for over exposure problem
chore(nui/widgets): add unbounded wildcards for type parameters
add standard and performant options for blockregion iteration
feat: Remove weird features near the origin from BrownianNoise
chore: Remove all the remaining occurences of SurfaceHeightFacet
feat(nui): allow batch-adding multiple paragraphs to HTMLDocument
fix: Time out of sync for players in multiplayer
feat: replace deprecated md5 assets with new gltf floating cube
chore: remove some of the most noisy debug logs
fix(world/chunks): make GenerateQueueEntity as Concurrent Collection
fix: reduce volume and overmodulation of main theme
fix: dispose physic's natives, stop threads.
fix(BlockRegion): correct center calculation for BlockRegion
ci(subsystems): Make TypeHandlerLibrary publishable with engine's version
chore: removed count field for issue #4242
fix: don't delete camera during purgeWorld command
fix(world): Compute border requests from rasterizers and `@Updates` annotations.
add joml snapshot 1.9.26 and start migrate mesh
chore (idea): ignore some user-specific plugin data
feat(JOML): add replacment methods and deprecates methods in MeshBuilder
feat(JOML): migrate joml to 1.10.0 and 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT for geometry
feature(subsystem-prepare): extract Network and R&R code from EventSystemImpl
feat(TypeHandlerLibrary): Add generic Serializer for TypeHandlerLibrary.
add missing absolute value for box collider extent
fix(publish): don't try to figure out the repository to publish to until after the version is set
chore(gradle): remove mavenLocal from project repositories
doc: add system requirements to README
feat(JOML): migrate chunkview and tests cases
fix: casing fix for homedir arg from Gradle
build: save build time by not checking jcenter for terasology dependencies
Mark new chunks ready before triggering OnChunkLoaded events.
chore: Couple minor tweaks - logic hardening and memory
fix: Move the final stage of chunk loading back to the main thread.
fix: remove reflection for gson deserilization in GsonTypeHandlerAdapter
